column2: an A.M. Eatery////My 3 year old and I came for an early treat after taking my husband to the airport. Unfortunately my toddler decided to have a complete meltdown in the restaurant which is always a little embarrassing but also very rare for him. Anyway the staff was so accommodating
column3: I felt like I was being treated like royalty. They brought my kid toys and talked to him
column5: and the bartender even asked him for a big hug when we left. While some places are intolerant of bratty children
column6: the staff this morning couldn't have been more patient and hospitable. On top of all that the food was really delicious - I had the makin it grain bowl and my kid had the chocolate chip pancake. We will come again!
